t: Wall Street ends mixed in choppy trading; Amazon, jobs report in focus | Reuters
s: February 6, 2025 - The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq ended higher while the Dow closed lower after a choppy trading session on Thursday, as investors sifted through earnings reports and awaited Amazon's results after the bell and a key jobs report on Friday.

Amazon axes some private-label brands as part of wider cost cuts
s: October 19, 2023 - The company didn't say how many private brands it plans to eliminate. Dozens of brands are expected to be cut, leaving Amazon with fewer than 20 house brands, according to The Wall Street Journal, which first reported the news.

t: Amazon reducing its private-label items as sales fall - WSJ | Reuters
s: July 15, 2022 - Amazon.com Inc has started reducing the number of items it sells under its own brands amid weak sales, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.
